name: Call Elf on the Shelf for Xmas
name_original: Call Elf on the Shelf for Xmas
description:
Yeep, Christmas is soon and you want to call the elf on the shelf! Oh Yes, you can, with the app call elf on the shelf for christmas to enjoy with your family's and your friends.

The app have this features Among them:

- Receive Calls from Elf, and the christmas gazelle, The fox, or Elf on the Chelf.
- Easy to use with his awesome graphics.
- Crazy Elf on the shelf Ringtone
- for more Fun you can play without using Wi-Fi.

How to use app?

- Choose between you like receive calls from, Elf, the fox, the gazelle or the elf on the shelf.
Click Green Button to accept the Fake Call and Enjoy it


Don't forget to tell play with your friends and your family with this app, and let me i know your feedbacks.
